Package fr.sorbonne_u.components.hem2025e1.equipments.batteries

Batteries component for the Household Energy Management project.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    BatteriesCI
    The component interface BatteriesCI defines the signatures of the services that are offered by batteries compoennts.
    BatteriesImplementationI
    The interface BatteriesImplementationI defines the signatures of operations that can be performed by batteries components.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Batteries
    The class Batteries implements a component for the batteries.
    BatteriesUnitTester
    The class BatteriesUnitTester implements a tester component for the component Batteries.
    CVMUnitTest
    The class CVMUnitTest performs unit tests on the hair dryer component.

Package fr.sorbonne_u.components.hem2025e1.equipments.batteries Description

Batteries component for the Household Energy Management project.

This package defines a batteries component used in the Household Energy Management project.
